name: What If
description:
In May 1984,  Alex Bonavich passed away. Engraved on his tombstone, we read "He was an unremarkable man". Just a random guy with no life experience or achievements. 
But what happened to him? Was his life really that pointless? What if you could change his timeline and fix his life? 
Explore Alex's life through many different possibilities and how he becomes a new man in this unusual puzzle game.
